scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup -g d3-scale:d3,d3-array:d3,d3-collection:d3 -f umd -n d3 -o build/d3-pedigree-tree.js -- index.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs build/d3-pedigree-tree.js -c -m -o build/d3-pedigree-tree.min.js
scripts.postpublish: zip -j build/d3-foo.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-pedigree-tree.js build/d3-pedigree-tree.min.js
